title: Knife, ca. 1690
markings: On blade: elongated arrow-shape with knob in the middle
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Leaf-shaped blade with plain bolster and engraved brass ferrule. Mother-of-pearl handle with inlaid bands of horn, ivory and brass in geometrical pattern. Three brass rivets and inlaid finials on the top of leaf-shaped handle.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1690.
ca. 1690. Steel, mother-of-pearl, horn. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-98.
